Label.en: However, their rejection may have been partially due to the fact that it was supposed to be a temporary building!
Label.fr: Mais le rejet se comprend mieux si l'on sait que le bâtiment devait être temporaire !
Label.es: However, their rejection may have been partially due to the fact that it was supposed to be a temporary building!
Label.zh: However, their rejection may have been partially due to the fact that it was supposed to be a temporary building!

Label.en: If you can believe it... the tower was planned as a temporary exhibition for the 1889 World Fair...
Label.fr: La tour devait servir d'attraction pendant la durée de l'exposition universelle...
Label.es: If you can believe it... the tower was planned as a temporary exhibition for the 1889 World Fair...
Label.zh: If you can believe it... the tower was planned as a temporary exhibition for the 1889 World Fair...

Label.en: it was intended that it would be dismantled after the event
Label.es: it was intended that it would be dismantled after the event
Label.zh: it was intended that it would be dismantled after the event
